name: Brace Yourself!
description: Shout. (5...13...15 seconds.) Prevents the next knock-down and deals 15...63...75 damage to all foes near target ally. Cannot self-target.

name: Can't Touch This!
description: Shout. (20 seconds.) The next 1...4...5 touch-range skills used against allies within earshot fail.

name: Fall Back!
description: Shout. (4...9...10 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain 5...13...15 Health per second while moving and move 33% faster. Ends for an ally if that ally hits with an attack.

name: Find Their Weakness!
description: Shout. (5...17...20 seconds.) Target ally deals +5...41...50 damage and inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...17...20 seconds) with the next attack.

name: Go for the Eyes!
description: Shout. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot have +30...86...100% to land a critical hit with their next attack.

name: Help Me!
description: Shout. (1...8...10 seconds.) Other allies' spells targeting you cast 50% faster. You gain 15...75...90 Health.

name: Incoming!
description: Elite Shout. (4...9...10 seconds) Allies in earshot move 33% faster and gain 5...13...15 Health while moving.

name: It's Just a Flesh Wound.
description: Elite Shout. Remove all conditions from target ally. That ally moves 25% faster (1...8...10 seconds) if a condition was removed. Cannot self-target.

name: Lead the Way!
description: Shout. Target ally moves 25% faster for 1...4...5 seconds (maximum of 20 seconds) for each ally in earshot.

name: Make Haste!
description: Shout. (5...17...20 seconds.) Target ally moves 33% faster. Ends if target ally hits with an attack. Cannot self-target.

name: Make Your Time!
description: Shout. You gain one adrenaline (maximum 1...4...5) for each party member in earshot.

name: Never Give Up!
description: Shout. Allies in earshot gain 1...8...10 Energy. Only affects allies below 75% Health.

name: Never Surrender!
description: Shout. (15 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain +1...4...5 Health regeneration. Only affects party members below 75% Health.

name: Stand Your Ground!
description: Shout. (5...17...20 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain +24 armor when not moving.

name: The Power Is Yours!
description: Elite Shout. (3 seconds.) Allies within earshot gain 0...1...1 Energy regeneration.

name: There's Nothing to Fear!
description: Shout. (4 seconds plus 1 second for every 2 ranks in Leadership.) Reduces damage by 20...35% for party members in earshot. End effect: heals for 35...60 Health.

name: They're on Fire!
description: Shout. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot take 5...29...35% less damage from Burning foes.

name: We Shall Return!
description: Shout. All party members in earshot are resurrected (25...45...50% Health and 5...17...20% Energy).

name: Aggressive Refrain
description: Echo. (5...21...25 seconds.) You attack 25% faster. Renewal: whenever a chant or shout ends on you. You have -20 armor.

name: Angelic Bond
description: Elite Skill. (10 seconds.) The next time an ally within earshot would take fatal damage
column10: that damage is negated and that ally is healed for 20...164...200. Ends on other allies.

name: Angelic Protection
description: Skill. (10 seconds.) Each second that target ally takes damage over 250...130...100
column10: that ally is healed for any damage over that amount. Cannot self target.

name: Anthem of Disruption
description: Chant. (1...8...10 seconds.) Allies in earshot interrupt an action with their next attack skill.

name: Anthem of Envy
description: Chant. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot do +10...22...25 damage with their next attack skill. Damage bonus only applies to foes with more than 50% Health.

name: Anthem of Flame
description: Chant. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot inflict Burning condition (1...3...3 seconds) with their next attack skill.

name: Anthem of Fury
description: Elite Chant. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain 1...3...4 adrenaline with their next attack skill.

name: Anthem of Guidance
description: Elite Chant. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot are unblockable with their next attack skill.

name: Anthem of Weariness
description: Chant. (8 seconds.) Allies in earshot inflict Weakness (1...13...16 seconds) with their next attack skill.

name: Aria of Restoration
description: Chant. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain 30...78...90 Health with their next spell.

name: Aria of Zeal
description: Chant. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain 1...5...6 Energy with their next spell.

name: Awe
description: Half Range Skill. Inflicts Dazed condition (5...13...15 seconds). No effect unless target is knocked-down.

name: Ballad of Restoration
description: Chant. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain 15...63...75 Health the next time they take damage.

name: Barbed Spear
description: Spear Attack. Inflicts Bleeding condition (5...17...20 seconds).

name: Bladeturn Refrain
description: Echo. (20 seconds.) Target ally has 5...17...20% chance to block. Renewal: Whenever a chant or shout ends on that ally. Cannot target spirits.

name: Blazing Finale
description: Echo. (10...30...35 seconds.) Inflicts Burning condition (1...6...7 seconds) to adjacent foes whenever a chant or shout ends on target ally. Cannot target spirits.

name: Blazing Spear
description: Spear Attack. Deals +5...21...25 damage. Inflicts Burning condition (1...3...3 seconds).

name: Burning Refrain
description: Echo. (20 seconds.) Inflicts Burning condition (1...3...3 seconds) if target ally hits a foe with more Health. Renewal: Whenever a chant or shout ends on that ally. Cannot target spirits.

name: Burning Shield
description: Skill. (3...8...9 seconds.) Blocks the next attack skill against you. Inflicts Burning condition (1...5...6 seconds) if it was a melee attack. No effect unless you are wielding a shield.

name: Cautery Signet
description: Elite Signet. All party members lose all conditions. You begin Burning (one second for each condition removed).

name: Chest Thumper
description: Spear Attack. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...17...20 seconds) if target foe has Cracked Armor.

name: Chorus of Restoration
description: Chant. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot are healed for 30...78...90 with their next shout or chant.

name: Crippling Anthem
description: Elite Chant. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot inflict Crippled condition (5...13...15 seconds) with their next attack skill.

name: Cruel Spear
description: Elite Spear Attack. Deals +1...25...31 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...17...20 seconds) if target is not moving.

name: Defensive Anthem
description: Elite Chant. (4...9...10 seconds.) Party members in earshot have 50% chance to block. Ends when hitting with an attack skill.

name: Disrupting Throw
description: Spear Attack. Interrupts actions. No effect unless target has a condition.

name: Enduring Harmony
description: Echo. (10...30...35 seconds.) Chants and shouts last 50% longer on target ally. Cannot target spirits.

name: Energizing Chorus
description: Chant. (10 seconds.) The next shout or chant costs 3...6...7 less Energy for allies within earshot.

name: Energizing Finale
description: Echo. (10...30...35 seconds.) Target ally gains 1 Energy whenever a shout or chant ends on that ally. Cannot target spirits.

name: Finale of Restoration
description: Echo. (10...30...35 seconds.) Target ally gains 15...63...75 Health whenever a shout or chant ends on that ally. Cannot target spirits.

name: Focused Anger
description: Elite Skill. (45 seconds.) You gain 0...120...150% more adrenaline.

name: Glowing Signet
description: Signet. You gain 5...13...15 Energy if target foe is Burning.

name: Godspeed
description: Shout. (5...17...20 seconds.) Allies in earshot move 25% faster while enchanted.

name: Harrier's Toss
description: Spear Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Deals 5...25...30 more damage if target is moving.

name: Hasty Refrain
description: Echo. (3...9...11 seconds.) Target ally moves 25% faster. Renewal: every time a chant or shout ends on this ally.

name: Heroic Refrain
description: Elite Echo. (3...13...15 seconds.) Target ally gains +1...3...3 to all attributes. Renewal: every time a chant or shout ends on this ally. Cannot target spirits. PvE Skill

name: Hexbreaker Aria
description: Chant. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot lose one hex with their next spell.

name: Holy Spear
description: Spear Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Deals 15...75...90 holy damage and inflicts Burning condition (3 seconds) to nearby foes if you hit a summoned creature.

name: Inspirational Speech
description: Skill. Target ally gains 1...3...4 strikes of adrenaline. Cannot self-target. You lose all adrenaline.

name: Leader's Comfort
description: Skill. You gain 30...66...75 Health. You also gain 10...18...20 Health (maximum 140) for each ally in earshot.

name: Leader's Zeal
description: Skill. You gain 2 Energy (maximum 8...11...12 Energy) for each nearby ally.

name: Lyric of Purification
description: Chant. (5...17...20 seconds.) Allies in earshot lose one condition with their next signet.

name: Lyric of Zeal
description: Chant. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain 1...7...8 Energy with their next signet.

name: Maiming Spear
description: Spear Attack. Inflicts Crippled condition (5...17...20 seconds) if target foe is Bleeding.

name: Mending Refrain
description: Echo. (15 seconds.) Target ally has +2...3...3 Health regeneration. Renewal: whenever a chant or shout ends on that ally. Cannot target spirits.

name: Merciless Spear
description: Spear Attack. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...17...20 seconds). No effect unless target has less than 50% Health.

name: Mighty Throw
description: Spear Attack. Deals +10...34...40 damage. This spear moves three times faster.

name: Natural Temper
description: Skill. (4...9...10 seconds.) You gain 33% more adrenaline. No effect if you are enchanted.

name: Purifying Finale
description: Echo. (10...30...35 seconds.) Target ally loses one condition whenever a chant or shout ends on that ally. Cannot target spirits.

name: Remedy Signet
description: Signet. You lose one condition.

name: Signet of Aggression
description: Signet. You gain 2 adrenaline if you are under the effects of a shout or chant.

name: Signet of Return
description: Signet. Resurrects target party member (5...13...15% Health and 1...3...4% Energy for each party member in earshot).

name: Signet of Synergy
description: Signet. Heal target ally for 40...88...100. You are also healed for 40...88...100 if you are not enchanted. Cannot self-target.

name: Slayer's Spear
description: Spear Attack. Deals +5...21...25 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...17...20 seconds) if target has more Health than you.

name: Soldier's Fury
description: Elite Echo. (10...30...35 seconds.) You attack 33% faster and gain 33% more adrenaline if under the effects of a shout or chant. You have -20 armor.

name: Song of Concentration
description: Chant. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot are uninterruptible with their next skill.

name: Song of Power
description: Chant. (5...17...20 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain +4 Energy regeneration. Ends when using a skill.

name: Song of Purification
description: Elite Chant. (20 seconds.) Allies in earshot lose one condition with their next 1...3...3 skills.

name: Song of Restoration
description: Elite Chant. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain 45...97...110 Health with their next skill.

name: Spear Swipe
description: Spear Melee Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage and inflicts Dazed condition (4...9...10 seconds). This attack has melee range.

name: Spear of Fury
description: Spear Attack. Deals +30...40 damage. Gain 3...6 strikes of adrenaline if you hit a foe with a condition.

name: Spear of Lightning
description: Spear Attack. Deals +8...18...20 lightning damage. 25% armor penetration.

name: Spear of Redemption
description: Spear Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. If it fails to hit

name: Stunning Strike
description: Elite Spear Attack. Deals +5...25...30 damage. Inflicts Dazed condition (4...9...10 seconds) if target has a condition.

name: Swift Javelin
description: Spear Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. This spear moves twice as fast and is unblockable if you are enchanted.

name: Unblockable Throw
description: Spear Attack. Deals +10...34...40 damage. Unblockable.

name: Vicious Attack
description: Spear Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...13...15 seconds) with a critical hit.

name: Wearying Spear
description: Spear Attack. Deals +10...34...40 damage. You are Weakened (5 seconds).

name: Wild Throw
description: Spear Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Unblockable. Ends target's stance. Disables your non-spear attack skills for 3 seconds.

name: Zealous Anthem
description: Chant. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain 1...7...8 Energy with their next attack skill.
